headline: Mark Neufeld resigns as Calgary police chief two years before contract is up
context: Calgary’s top cop is stepping down—effective immediately.
Chief Constable Mark Neufeld resigned on Friday, and has been replaced by Katie McLellan as the interim chief.

annotations.paragraph: In a release, Neufeld said he’s honoured to have served Calgarians in the chief’s role for the past six years.

annotations.paragraph: “I wish the rest of the organization nothing but success moving forward,” he said.
